Enotice-App Sorry, Sign-in Failed. Please Try Again. Sorry, Email/Password Fields are Empty. Welcome! Let us get started. Enter a valid Email Address. Enter a Password of 8 or more characters. Registration Successful. Registration Failed. Successfully Signed out Press the back button once again to close the application. Welcome Welcome to the E-Notice Board App The notice has been APPROVED. The notice has been REJECTED. Notice upload SUCCESSFUL. Notice upload FAILED. Welcome to the Mechanical Department Welcome to the Computer Science Department
//Intro Strings Authentic Material is the metaphor Bold, Consistent, Intentional, Real-time All Departments Connected Light and Shadow, Online and Offline
All new SCALABLE Authentication Levels. Secure access to respective accounts without conflicts in priority levels. Always On-the-go with REAL-TIME notice sync and consistent communication between Android Application, Web Application and LED Displays spread across the campus. Motion of Notices from one department to another on same priority level using CROSS-DEPARTMENT PORTAL. Within the material environment, virtual lights illuminate the scene. OFFLINE-STORAGE Capabilities coming soon!
Requesting Permissions This app needs the CAMERA and STORAGE permissions. Please grant the permissions before proceeding.
Click me! Hey, that\'s how custom CTA buttons work in material-intro!
